explanation: based on the historical price data provided, meta (meta platforms, inc.) shows a pattern of increasing prices over the last several months, indicating a positive trend. from november 2022 to november 2023, the price of meta has increased from 106.40 to 328.49 dollars per share, showing significant growth. given this trend, it is reasonable to expect that the price may continue to rise or at least remain stable by the end of december 2023. on the other hand, gme (gamestop corp) has shown a decrease in price from 21.54 in december 2022 to 14.52 in december 2023, indicating a negative trend. spy (s&p 500) has shown some volatility but has been relatively stable, with a slight increase from 390.38 in december 2022 to 455.77 in december 2023. however, the growth rate of meta outpaces that of spy, suggesting that meta may offer a better return on investment within the given timeframe. therefore, based on the historical data and the observed trends, investing in meta appears to be the most promising option for maximizing profit by the end of december 2023.
